site.title: ZeroHello 3.0
site.description: You can sort your pages in categorys. You must only add the page to favorites...and then you can choose a category on the ... menu of the site the you want give a category. In order to add a page to favorites click on the ... menu of a page and then select Favorite and on Favorites you can click the ... menu again and then you can choose a category e.g To Politics. You must set this page as your homepage.Or you delete your all.js of your ZeroHello homepage and copy the all.js of this page in your js folder of your ZeroHello homepage. In Favorites you can choose e.g To Politics and you have a category with the title Politics sites. You can also hide your pages of a category. Click on the category name e.g Politics sites and then your pages are invisible...In order to see your pages you must click on the category name again.....Or you delete your all.js of your ZeroHello homepage and copy the all.js of this page in your js folder of your ZeroHello homepage. In Favorites you can choose e.g To Politics and you have a category with the title Politics sites. You can also hide your pages of a category. Click on the category name e.g Politics sites and then your pages are invisible...In order to see your pages you must click on the category name again.....Or you delete your all.js of your ZeroHello homepage and copy the all.js of this page in your js folder of your ZeroHello homepage. In Favorites you can choose e.g To Politics and you have a category with the title Politics sites. You can also hide your pages of a category. Click on the category name e.g Politics sites and then your pages are invisible...In order to see your pages you must click on the category name again.....Or replace the data/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/js/all.js with data/1DpVeXf8V2xgLtVb3tGsDNp2EWmPoJysoN/js/all.js
